channel.title: WordPress 3.0 on Sometimes we write something:)
channel.description: Recent content in WordPress 3.0 on Sometimes we write something:)

item.title: Moving to WordPress
item.description: <img src="/media/wordpress-logo.png" alt="wordpress logo" /> I’ve used Drupal to power my blog since I started it over 2 years ago. It has been a bitter sweet relationship, but in general I’ve been pleased. In those two years, WordPress as a product has rocketed past Drupal, and feels much more mature. While Drupal 7 should level the field a bit, it’s a ways away and WordPress 3.0 is already here.
